data.persona: I am the queen of this kingdom.  I am the second wife of the king.  He is often off at battle.  I am left to rule alone.
data.description:
You are in the King's Dorm.
The walls are adorned with artwork of previous Kings and Queens, battles and events of note. The walls are smooth hewn marble, the floor a mosaic of colored stones quarried far away.
The talking cat and the princess are here.

You are carrying a Books.

data.short_motivation: I need to make sure the princess does her daily studies
data.mid_motivation: I must groom the princess for leadership
data.long_motivation: I must make sure the princess will be ready to lead the kingdom when I am old and pass away.
